EmailTemplate.name: Miscellaneous Projects.2016 NBAA Connectivity Email.2016 NBAA Connectivity Event
EmailTemplate.subject: RSVP: Breakfast, Connectivity Demos and More at NBAA 2016
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.honeywellaidc.com/pages/SiteLanguages.aspx]]> SHOW ANNOUNCEMENT | NBAA 2016 LIVE JETWAVE/AEROWAVE DEMONSTRATIONS Honeywell Booth #2200 (Near the South Entrance) Visit us at NBAA to experience our in-flight connectivity solution, JetWave, as we demo it in our booth on Nov. 1 (10am-6pm), Nov. 2 (9am-5pm) and Nov. 3 (9am-3pm). Learn more about JetWave to see how we're redefining in-flight Wi-Fi on airlines to general aviation aircraft.
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/safety-and-connectivity/jetwave-high-speed-satellite-communications-hardware]]> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/service-listing/cabin-connectivity]]>
CABIN CONNECTIVITY SESSIONS (30 MINS) Orange County Convention Center Room s230c Join us as we discuss "Cabin Connectivity - Maximizing User Experience While Controlling Cost" at any one of our 30 minute sessions on Nov. 1 (9:30.11:30.12:30) or Nov. 2 (9:30.11:30.12:30). Learn more about our GoDirect cabin connectivity services before the show and make sure to bring your questions with you!
AVIONICS MAGAZINE SPONSORED BREAKFAST Orange County Convention Center Room N320 C/D We're a proud sponsor of the Avionics Connectivity breakfast. Join us on November 2 at 7:30 am as leaders from both Honeywell and Avionics discuss how to keep up with the increasing global demand for high-speed connectivity. Reserve your spot today as seating is limited!
<[[https://www.eiseverywhere.com/ereg/index.php?eventid=205304&]]> <[[https://www.naraaircraft.com/]]>
NARA STATIC CHALET Orlando Executive Airport Visit us at the National Aircraft Resale Association on Nov. 1 (9am-6pm), Nov. 2 (9am-5pm) or Nov. 3 (9am-3pm) as we answer all questions JetWave and demo some our GoDirect apps geared for pilots, maintenance crews and operators.
© 2016 Honeywell International Inc. <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellNow/]]> <[[http://twitter.com/honeywellaidc]]> <[[http://www.youtube.com/honeywellaidc]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-scanning-&-mobility?trk=hb_tab_compy_id_2921697]]> This message was sent to name@website.com.
